text: Haha~ Hinana is playing with Toru-senpai~
...There's nothing serious about this kind of thing.

Koito-chan is working on it too.
Seriously.
B-But, making soap bubbles was fun, right?
I wonder how many years it's been...

Hmm~ Hinana might have made
them when she was in elementary school~

It would be nice... if we could do this kind of job again.
Fun jobs...!
